property.name: offer_key
property.value: You've been granted an additional 100 skill points by an Administrator!\n\nIt's impossible to spend them all in one place!

property.name: offer_key
property.value: You've read a mysterious tome which has granted you 50,000 experience!

property.name: offer
property.value: Hankering for some new pants, need some gunpowder to fuel your slaughter, or just want a safe place to chill out during the day?\n\nCome and visit your local Trader!
